A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was not a terrible movie but it most definitely was not a great movie either. At the end I didn't feel like the last 2 and a half hours were well spent. I don't mind comedy but it seemed forced into the script. The storyline wasn't cohesive\, Adam Driver's acting still reminds me of a ma petulant teenagers behavior. Hux's lisp/accent was infuriating as was much of the dialogue in this movie. The battles were ok but just ok. Rey was the highlight of this movie\, it's hard to argue that she's the one thing that kept this movie afloat. You could wait for this to be released on video and save yourself the bother of having to go see it in a theatre. As a life long Star Wars fan I was not impressed.
